items.question: What is SYNC VIP access and how do I get 10% off?
items.answer: Get VIP access by signing up on our website. You'll receive 10% off your first purchase at Sync.com, plus early access to product launches, exclusive sales, and curated news. Submit your email in the VIP section on the homepage to join.

items.question: Where are SYNC products made?
items.answer: Many of our most iconic amps and audio products are made in the U.S. Our heritage traces back to Sonic Sound in Alabama, where we've been crafting amps and gear for decades. Select product pages and our About us section detail which items are U.S.-built.

items.question: What does SYNC offer for shipping and returns?
items.answer: Shipping and return options are outlined in our Shipping and Returns policy. Visit the Support or footer links on Sync.com for current rates, delivery times, and return eligibility. Contact us for orders or damaged items.

items.question: What is SYNC's warranty policy?
items.answer: SYNC offers warranty coverage on our speakers, headphones, and amps. Exact terms depend on the product. Check the product page or the Warranty section under Support on our website for details, or contact us for specific coverage.

items.question: What product categories does SYNC sell?
items.answer: SYNC sells speakers (home, portable, professional), headphones (in-ear, over-ear, wireless), and amps (tube, solid state, digital, hybrid). We also offer accessories, SYNC for Business solutions, and Artist Services. Shop by category or use filters like Bluetooth and Smart speaker to find the right gear.

items.question: How do I contact SYNC or get support?
items.answer: Use the Contact link in the footer or the Support section on our website. You can reach us for orders, warranty, shipping, returns, and product questions. For Pro and Artist Services, see the dedicated Pro and Artist Services areas on the site.

items.question: Does SYNC have special offers or discounts?
items.answer: Yes. Our "Loud for less" section highlights special offers and deals. VIP members get 10% off their first purchase and access to exclusive sales. Check the Shop special offers area and sign up for VIP to stay updated on promotions.
